chapters.title: Chapter 23: Foxheads
chapters.info: Weilin Aldragoran, p. 380—Seller of gems, rare woods, furs, finely-made swords, and armor in Saldaea. He is Malkieri, and still wears the hadori. He was a toddler when Malkier was overrun. He was among the first Nynaeve found with news of Lan's march.
